solution_line_template: Emily spends {num_episodes} episodes * {episode_length_minutes} minutes = <<{num_episodes}*{episode_length_minutes}={tv_watching_minutes}>>{tv_watching_minutes} minutes watching TV.
Emily spends {sleep_duration_hours} hours * {minutes_per_hour} minutes = <<{sleep_duration_hours}*{minutes_per_hour}={sleep_duration_minutes}>>{sleep_duration_minutes} minutes sleeping.

Emily spends {num_movies} movies * {movie_length_hours} hours * {minutes_per_hour} minutes = <<{num_movies}*{movie_length_hours}*{minutes_per_hour}={movie_watching_minutes}>>{movie_watching_minutes} minutes watching movies.

The total time spent doing activities is {tv_watching_minutes} + {sleep_duration_minutes} + {movie_watching_minutes} = <<{tv_watching_minutes}+{sleep_duration_minutes}+{movie_watching_minutes}={total_activity_minutes}>>{total_activity_minutes} minutes
The total length of the flight is {flight_duration_hours} hours * {minutes_per_hour} minutes = <<{flight_duration_hours}*{minutes_per_hour}={total_flight_minutes}>>{total_flight_minutes} minutes

The number of minutes remaining in the flight is {total_flight_minutes} - {total_activity_minutes} = <<{total_flight_minutes}-{total_activity_minutes}={remaining_flight_minutes}>>{remaining_flight_minutes} minutes
